Package org.opt4j.operators.algebra

Provides the classes for the algebra operator for genotypes. This operator performs simple linear algebra to to double vectors. The Algebra operator can only be applied to vectors of doubles, thus, the DoubleGenotype.

See Also:
Algebra, Term, DoubleGenotype
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Algebra<G extends Genotype>
    The Algebra operator.
    Term
    The Term interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add
    The Add term adds multiple Terms.
    AlgebraDouble
    The AlgebraDouble for DoubleGenotype.
    AlgebraGenericImplementation
    The AlgebraGenericImplementation is a standard implementation of the Algebra interface.
    Div
    The Div divides two terms.
    Index
    The Index returns the i-th value of the values array of the Index.calculate(double...) method.
    Mult
    The Mult term multiplies multiple Terms.
    Pow
    The Pow performs an exponentiation of two Terms.
    Sub
    The Sub term subtracts two Terms.
    Var
    The Var returns a double value.
